faq.question: Is this accurate for legal contracts?
faq.answer: Our AI achieves 95%+ accuracy in extracting key terms. However, AI summaries are for initial review only - always have qualified legal counsel review important contracts.

faq.question: What types of contracts does it support?
faq.answer: All contract types: NDAs, employment agreements, vendor contracts, service agreements, leases, licensing agreements, and more.

faq.question: Is my data secure and confidential?
faq.answer: Yes! We use enterprise-grade encryption, never train on your data, and comply with attorney-client privilege requirements.

faq.question: Can it identify unusual or risky clauses?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI flags clauses that deviate from standard terms, including unusual indemnification, liability limits, and termination conditions.

faq.question: What's included in Team plan pricing?
faq.answer: Team plans include unlimited contracts, priority processing, bulk uploads, and admin controls for managing firm access.
